author: pipermerriam
content: You'll have to be more specific.  What nodes?  How would they use it?

author: p1ge0nh8er
content: to maximize uptime/broadcast tx pool faster?

author: pipermerriam
content: I encourage you to do an experiment or something to validate your idea

author: ogenev
content:
I will not be able to attend the stand up today. My updates:

- I'm continuing experimenting with the testing framework for portal network clients. Added json-rpc handler to the dummy node, which is now able to send Ping, FindNodes and FindContent messages to the node under test

- I'm also experimenting  with paritytech's json-rpc rust library. So far it seems a better production alternative to the current custom jsonr-rpc implementation in Trin.

author: pipermerriam
content:
I'll be holding office hours next Wednesday from 1500-1700 UTC: https://www.worldtimebuddy.com/?qm=1&lid=5128581,2643743,100,7&h=5128581&date=2021-9-2&sln=11-13&hf=1

If you would like a calendar invite for this DM me the email address you'd like it sent to

author: pipermerriam
content: I am also available if you wish schedule 1:1 time, just reach out to me directly.
